snippet.title: Love Live! School Idol Festival -after school ACTIVITY- Wai-Wai! Home Meeting!!  Promotional trailer
snippet.description:
PlayStaion®4 download-only software scheduled to be released on Wednesday March 24, 2021. The "free base version" of this title will be distributed as a download-only software, with 8 songs and 3 costumes available for free! You can enjoy the live performances of μ's, Aqours, and Saint Snow with beautiful 3D graphics on a big screen at home.
There are 117 additional songs and 60 different costumes to choose from, so you can create your very own SIF ACHM.

Official site: https://lovelive-sifachm.square-enix-games.com/
#lovelive #PS4
